resources.string: Ensure the receiving device has turned on HotKnot, and keep its screen unlocked.
Put your device onto the receiving device screen-to-screen.
Take your device away from the receiving device after you hear a voice prompt.
This application needs to use HotKnot technology on your device.
Failed to share due to connection problem.
Failed to share due to unknown error.
HotKnot function may be affected during USB charging.
